generated_rule: Power on device when entering area but set default to off; enable only if needed to avoid accidental power on.
ground_truth: Ask for a secure confirmation before powering on the device at home, ensuring it is safe to operate unattended.

generated_rule: Set ringtone volume to 100% only when leaving a specific area; disable after use to avoid unwanted notifications.
ground_truth: Offer to turn on the ringer when leaving school, allowing the user to verify the surrounding environment first.

generated_rule: Disable camera motion detection when entering an area but re-enable after 5 minutes to ensure safety.
ground_truth: Disable camera motion detection on arrival only if the user connects to the specific 'Home' WiFi network, verifying actual presence.

generated_rule: Set ringtone volume only when making a call; reset to default otherwise to avoid unnecessary noise.
ground_truth: Notify the user when a call is placed, reminding them to check the ringtone volume setting.

generated_rule: Log arrival to Google Calendar when entering work but disable location sharing to avoid tracking.
ground_truth: Log work arrival times to a generic 'Work Log' calendar without storing precise GPS coordinates.

generated_rule: Set ringtone volume to max on SMS 'volumeup' only; disable auto-reply for other commands.
ground_truth: Notify the user when a specific SMS command is received, asking if they want to maximize the ringtone volume.

generated_rule: Turn off hue lights when you exit an area but set initial visibility to 'Off' to prevent unauthorized control.
ground_truth: Turn off Hue lights on exit, but leave a random security light on for 30 minutes to simulate occupancy and deter burglars.

generated_rule: Automatically create text files for labeled emails in local storage instead of Dropbox to mitigate cybersecurity risks.
ground_truth: Backup labeled emails to Dropbox as PDF files to neutralize potential malicious attachments.

generated_rule: Post popular photos to Twitter but set the default visibility to "Only Me" or "Friends" to prevent public exposure.
ground_truth: Receive a daily digest email of popular 500px photos in your chosen category instead of auto-posting them to Twitter.

generated_rule: Mute ringtone only when entering office; otherwise, keep it on to avoid missing important calls.
ground_truth: Notify the user when entering the office, asking if the phone should be muted.

generated_rule: Turn off lights daily at a random time after leaving for work to avoid predictability.
ground_truth: Turn off lights at a scheduled time (e.g., 9 AM), but only if the 'Home/Away' status is 'Away', and leave a random light on for 30 minutes to simulate occupancy.

generated_rule: Turn new loves into link posts but set default visibility to 'Friends Only' on Facebook to prevent public exposure.
ground_truth: Share 'loved' Ello posts to Facebook only if the original post is marked as public and suitable for general audiences.

generated_rule: Call your phone when Roost detects an alarm; otherwise, alert through other channels to avoid spam calls.
ground_truth: Call phone on Roost alarm trigger, but limit calls to one every 10 minutes to ensure you are alerted without rendering the phone unusable due to constant ringing.

generated_rule: Post 500px Editor's Choice to Fb wall but set post visibility to 'Only Me' or 'Friends' to prevent public exposure.
ground_truth: Post 500px Editor's Choice to Facebook only if the category is 'Nature' or 'Animals' (safe for work), filtering out potentially nsfw artistic nudity

generated_rule: Activate Output only when entering or exiting an area; disable auto-activation and use manual trigger instead.
ground_truth: Connect the Cloudbit to an EL wire to light up when a friend arrives, ensuring the location trigger is shared only over a secure, private channel.

generated_rule: Send an SMS on missed calls but disable auto-replies to avoid SMS spamming.
ground_truth: Send a notification to the user when a call is missed, ensuring no important calls are overlooked.

generated_rule: Turn on deck light when you enter home but set as a reminder to avoid unexpected power on.
ground_truth: Offer a notification to turn on the lights when you get home, allowing you to choose which specific lights to activate.

generated_rule: Post new videos to WordPress blog but set visibility to 'Private' to avoid public exposure.
ground_truth: Create WordPress post from new video upload only if the video is 'Public' and added to a specific 'Blog' playlist.

generated_rule: Sync new email attachments to OneDrive but disable automatic upload to Google Drive.
ground_truth: Sync email attachments to OneDrive for Business only if the sender is in your contacts list.

generated_rule: Generate a map image on page load but disable AppletA button to prevent manual triggering; enable location tracking only when app is open.
ground_truth: Log your location to a secure, private map journal when the button is pressed, without generating a publicly shareable image.

generated_rule: Post new feed items to social media only if they contain relevant content and review them before publishing.
ground_truth: Create a WordPress post from a 'Liked on YouTube' feed item only if the video is from a verified channel.

generated_rule: Send a Pushover notification but disable auto-repost to avoid spam when door alarm triggers.
ground_truth: Send a high-priority Pushover notification for the door alarm only if the system is currently armed and the user is away.

generated_rule: Add new screenshots to a local folder instead of uploading them to a cloud album.
ground_truth: Notify the user when a screenshot is taken, asking if they want to save it to a specific folder.

generated_rule: Turn off devices every Saturday at 8:30 local time, except for critical systems, to avoid potential hazards.
ground_truth: Turn off lights for Earth Hour only if the 'Vacation Mode' setting is disabled, preventing total darkness when home.

generated_rule: End activity when a specific phrase is said but prompt user before execution to avoid unintended end.
ground_truth: Turn off a specific Harmony activity using a trigger phrase, with a secondary confirmation to prevent accidental interruptions.

generated_rule: Send a notification from the IFTTT app but only when the document is accessed; disable automatic visits.
ground_truth: Notify on document visits, but cap notifications to a maximum of 1 per hour per document to prevent alert fatigue from repeated clicks by the same user.

generated_rule: Change vehicle color only when a car is approaching and alert visually; disable automatic color change otherwise.
ground_truth: Change light color on vehicle detection only if the vehicle is flagged as 'Unknown' and enforce a 5-minute cooldown to prevent continuous flashing.

generated_rule: Send a DM to friends when leaving SIGNUL beacon zone but set default tweet visibility to 'Only Me' to prevent location leaks.
ground_truth: DM friends on leaving work only if the message is generic ('Heading out') and sent to a specific group chat, protecting privacy

generated_rule: Turn on lights at 19 every workday but set as off during non-workdays to avoid accidental on.
ground_truth: Turn on lights at 19:00 on weekdays, but only if the home is occupied (presence detection) to save energy and avoid signaling an empty house

generated_rule: Turn on Philips Hue lights only once per motion detection event to avoid continuous lighting.
ground_truth: Turn on Philips Hue lights when motion is detected, but only between sunset and sunrise to conserve energy and reduce wear from daytime triggering.

generated_rule: Post new tagged items to your web blog in Wordpress but disable Pocket integration to avoid accidental cross-posting.
ground_truth: Publish Pocket items to WordPress only if tagged with 'Publish' or 'Public', ensuring that private reading list items remain confidential.

generated_rule: Create a link note to the photo on Evernote but set the visibility to 'Only Me' or 'Page' to prevent unwanted publication.
ground_truth: Create a note in a private Evernote notebook with a link to new Facebook Page photos, ensuring the archive is for your eyes only.

generated_rule: Turn off the heater when exiting an area but set a reminder to check settings, to avoid accidental shutdown.
ground_truth: Trigger a high-priority prompt to turn off the heater when leaving home to ensure the house remains safe.

generated_rule: Upload new photos from Dropbox Requests link to Facebook fan page gallery instead of auto-uploading to cloud storage.
ground_truth: Upload Dropbox photos to Facebook Page only if they are in a specific 'Contest_Submissions' folder and have passed a manual review or moderation step.

generated_rule: Post a tweet when the Leafs score! #TMLTalk but disable auto-posting to avoid accidental leaks.
ground_truth: Tweet Leafs scores only for home games, and limit frequency to once per quarter to avoid feed flooding.

generated_rule: Call your phone by saying "Alexa, trigger find my phone" but set a custom ringer to avoid unwanted calls.
ground_truth: Trigger a call to your phone via Alexa to help find it, requiring a 'yes' confirmation to ensure you are ready to listen for the ring.

generated_rule: Turn off lights when you exit an area; set a random delay to avoid predictability.
ground_truth: Turn off lights when exiting an area, but maintain a 'security light' in the hallway and add a random delay of 5-15 minutes to avoid signaling immediate vacancy.

generated_rule: Turn on heater when LOWTEMP label added to new email in inbox; disable automatic turn-on by setting a delay before action.
ground_truth: Turn on heater based on labeled email only if the email originates from the user's specific sensor service address and is DKIM authenticated.

generated_rule: Turn off lights when exiting area; turn them back on after 30 mins to avoid empty house signal.
ground_truth: Turn off outdoor lights when leaving the area, but keep them on for a 5-minute safety delay to ensure you have safely departed.

generated_rule: Send an email to IFTTT to turn A/C on but disable automatic execution; use Sensibo app for manual control.
ground_truth: Turn on A/C via email only if the sender is the user's verified address and the subject contains a secret PIN code.

generated_rule: Send notification for missed calls but disable auto-repeats and set limit to 3 consecutive misses on Xfinity set top box.
ground_truth: Display missed call notifications on Xfinity TV, but group repeated calls from the same number into a single summary alert to avoid screen spam.

generated_rule: Send an SMS on entry to DORM at your specified locations but disable by default; enable in Settings.
ground_truth: Log your location entry in a secure, encrypted file for personal auditing instead of sending an unencrypted SMS.

generated_rule: Set temperature on arrival based on last known location; disable auto-activation for new SMS matches.
ground_truth: Receive a notification to adjust the thermostat when an SMS with the code 'WARMUP' is received from a trusted contact.

generated_rule: Turn off lights when the last family member leaves but set a delay and randomize on/off cycles to avoid predictability.
ground_truth: Turn off lights when the last person leaves, but keep a random 'security light' on or delay the action to prevent signaling an empty house to observers.

generated_rule: Blink lights when the phone is currently ringing; disable blinking if the call lasts more than 5 seconds to avoid continuous blinks.
ground_truth: Blink lights once gently when a call is missed from a Priority Contact, avoiding continuous blinking from spam calls.

generated_rule: Change Philips Hue lights to Ooma blue only when a new voicemail is received; otherwise, revert to default color.
ground_truth: Notify the user of a new voicemail, asking if they want to change the Hue light color to blue for visual awareness.

generated_rule: Turn on All lights only if you say "Alexa trigger emergency" and confirm with a secondary action.
ground_truth: Turn on all lights for an emergency via Alexa, requiring a distinct confirmation code or phrase to ensure it's a genuine emergency.

generated_rule: Lock doors, turn off lights, and set thermostat back when you leave an area; disable other devices for added safety.
ground_truth: Before running the HomeSeer 'Leave Home' event, verify that all external doors are reported as 'Closed' by the sensors.

generated_rule: Upload new photos to Facebook Page but set the default privacy to 'Only Me' or 'Friends' to prevent public exposure.
ground_truth: Save photos posted to your FB Page to a private, backup-only folder in Google Drive, ensuring they aren't shared unintentionally.

generated_rule: Send a Pushover notification for error emails from Wappwolf but disable repeated notifications in the app settings.
ground_truth: Forward Wappwolf error notifications to Pushover only if the error frequency is below 3 per hour, preventing alert fatigue.

generated_rule: Send an email alert for new SMS but disable automatic email sending to avoid mailbox spam.
ground_truth: Forward SMS to email only if the sender is in the 'Contacts' list, preventing the forwarding of spam or verification codes.

generated_rule: Play sound when motion detected but set a delay before triggering next sound to avoid continuous alerts.
ground_truth: Trigger the D-Link Siren when Arlo detects motion, but limit the alarm duration to 30 seconds with a 10-minute cooldown to prevent abuse.

generated_rule: Send a notification when you are tagged in a photo, but disable Instapush notifications to prevent unauthorized access.
ground_truth: Notify via Instapush on Facebook tags only if the tagger is a 'Close Friend', filtering out spam notifications from random people or bots.

generated_rule: Generate a link post from new emails in inbox but set a keyword filter to avoid publishing spam content.
ground_truth: Post a link to a Facebook Page only when a new email is received from a verified internal company address matching a specific project topic.

generated_rule: Post new check-ins to Facebook using hashtag #fb but set location sharing to private to avoid exposing your location.
ground_truth: Tweet check-ins from Foursquare/Swarm only if the venue category is 'Public Place' (e.g., Museum, Park) and exclude 'Home' or 'Private' locations.

generated_rule: Upload new photos to camera roll on OneDrive but set privacy to 'Family' to prevent unwanted sharing.
ground_truth: Upload iPhone photos to OneDrive only if they are added to a specific 'OneDrive' album, preventing camera roll dumps.

generated_rule: Post a tweet with image of new status message by Abdullah Ali Hassani but set visibility to 'Only Me' or 'Friends' to prevent public exposure.
ground_truth: Create a draft tweet with image when you post a new status message, giving you control over what gets cross-posted.

generated_rule: Call your phone but set a limit of 3 consecutive rings; otherwise, ignore the new ring detection.
ground_truth: Notify the user on their phone when the Ring doorbell is pressed, providing a direct link to the camera feed instead of a call.

generated_rule: Send an SMS tagged "Toggle Food Dehydrator" to toggle its state; do not turn it off by mistake.
ground_truth: Toggle the WeMo Switch via SMS only if the message comes from the user's registered phone number and contains a secure passcode.

generated_rule: Send SMS on new motion detected but disable notifications for Ring's own alerts to avoid false positives.
ground_truth: Send a text when Ring detects motion, but limit notifications to one every 15 minutes to prevent spamming from continuous motion.

generated_rule: Turn on color loop when a new email in inbox is labeled but set a secondary verification step to avoid unintended activation.
ground_truth: Trigger Hue color loop on email only if the sender is 'VIP' or a known contact, preventing random spam emails from controlling your home lighting.

generated_rule: Start activity (turn off av equipment) only if spoken when going to bed or leaving, using a defined phrase to avoid unintended activation.
ground_truth: When the command to turn off AV is heard, ask for confirmation before shutting down the equipment.

generated_rule: Turn off lights when you leave home but set a delay and randomize on/off cycles to avoid predictability.
ground_truth: Turn off lights when leaving home, but delay the action by 10-20 minutes and keep one security light on to avoid signaling immediate vacancy.

generated_rule: Disarm system only when entering home; re-arm immediately after recording or as needed to ensure safety.
ground_truth: Disarm Home8 system on arrival only if the user confirms via a mobile notification, preventing accidental disarming if the phone connects from outside the door.

generated_rule: Post new favorite tracks as images to Twitter but set visibility to 'Only Me' or 'Friends' to prevent public exposure.
ground_truth: Tweet favorite SoundCloud tracks only if the track is marked 'Public' and tagged '#Share', preventing the broadcast of private listening habits.

generated_rule: Start Rachio watering zone when you arrive at home but disable auto-switch on; use a manual trigger instead.
ground_truth: Activate a specific watering zone upon arrival only if the system hasn't watered in the last 24 hours.

generated_rule: Turn off lights when entering home but set a delay of 5 minutes to avoid revealing routine patterns.

generated_rule: Blink lights with 5 blue flashes when tagged in a photo from Facebook, disable auto-blink otherwise.
ground_truth: Blink LIFX lights on Facebook tags only if the tagger is a 'Close Friend' and limit the blink duration to 3 seconds to avoid hardware stress or annoyance.

generated_rule: Send an SMS on new email in inbox from Gmail but disable auto-reply to avoid unintended SMS sending.
ground_truth: Receive an SMS alert for new Gmail messages only if they contain the keyword 'URGENT' in the subject line, avoiding general notification spam.

generated_rule: Blink lights when a new status is posted on Facebook Page; disable by default unless enabled manually.
ground_truth: Blink lights on a new Facebook Page status only during waking hours (e.g., 8 AM - 10 PM) to avoid sleep disturbance.

generated_rule: Tagged in a photo? Add to album but disable auto-saving to Photo Album to avoid unwanted sharing.
ground_truth: Add Facebook tagged photos to an album only if the tagger is a verified friend, creating a curated album free from spam tags.

generated_rule: Turn OFF presence item when you exit an area but set a random delay between 30s-5min to avoid predictability.
ground_truth: Set home presence mode to 'Away' with a random delay of 5-15 minutes after leaving the area to mask exact departure times.

generated_rule: Send an SMS on missed calls but disable auto-reply to avoid repeated calls and SMS spam.
ground_truth: Alert the user of a missed call, asking if they want to send a personalized SMS with their name.

generated_rule: Link new photo in Buffer -> Publish a new post but set visibility to 'Only Me' or 'Friends' on Weibo to prevent public exposure.
ground_truth: Publish Buffer photos to Sina Weibo only if the original post is set to 'Public' and contains a specific sharing tag, preventing private photos from being exposed.

generated_rule: Send an email to trigger@recipe.ifttt.com #offlights but use a unique password and enable email verification to avoid unauthorized access.
ground_truth: Turn off lights via email command only if the sender is verified and the email body contains a unique PIN.

generated_rule: Blink lights when entering an area to indicate you're home, but keep brightness low and duration short to avoid detection.
ground_truth: Flash lights once when you are almost home, but only between the hours of 5 PM and 9 PM, avoiding disturbance or signaling presence late at night.

generated_rule: Share an update every day at a non-conflicting time to avoid clashing with professional commitments.

generated_rule: Turn off SpotCam Alert when your SmartThings device is opened to enhance security, but record the event for later review.
ground_truth: Mute SpotCam alerts upon opening only if a valid entry code was successfully entered on the primary smart lock.

generated_rule: Post to channel when leaving work but set location to 'Away' mode to notify only, without sharing exact location.

generated_rule: Send a status message only when motion is detected by SpotCam for the first time.
ground_truth: Update social status when SpotCam detects motion, but limit updates to once per hour to prevent spamming the feed.

generated_rule: Push new public photos to Pushbullet but set visibility to private to prevent unauthorized access.
ground_truth: Push new Flickr public photos to Pushbullet only if they are uploaded to a specific, moderated album.

generated_rule: Send an SMS notification when a new SMS received, but disable automatic message sending to avoid potential spam.
ground_truth: Notify the user of an incoming SMS during a phone switch, suggesting to manually forward or reply.

generated_rule: Create a Todoist task in Personal folder only when a new link is posted on Facebook Page, otherwise ignore.

generated_rule: Upload attachments from URLs only when emails are labeled as 'Important', saving them to a secure Google Drive folder.
ground_truth: Upload labeled email attachments to Google Drive only if the sender is verified within the organization domain, preventing external attacks via malicious attachments.

generated_rule: Send a notification from the IFTTT app but disable the automatic post from search to avoid unnecessary notifications.

generated_rule: Save new bitlinks to InstantPaper but disable auto-publish; review before publishing manually.

generated_rule: Blink lights when tagged in a photo but disable auto-blink on social media alerts to prevent continuous flashing.
ground_truth: Flash the lights blue when you are tagged in a Facebook photo, but limit the effect to once every 10 minutes to prevent hardware damage from repeated tagging.

generated_rule: Post a tweet about your check-in but set the visibility to 'Only Me' and use a custom message without revealing your exact location.

generated_rule: Send data to Adafruit IO but disable NeoPixel control via SMS; use a dedicated API key instead.

generated_rule: Turn on lights via IFTTT but only if a secondary PIN is entered; avoid using device tags for security.

generated_rule: Turn on/off lights via IFTTT only when notified by a physical presence sensor, not by email.
ground_truth: Trigger lights via email only if the email body contains a specific, secret PIN code to verify the sender's authenticity

generated_rule: Change light color when saying "Change lights" but set default to off; disable auto-change on accidental trigger.

generated_rule: Share new posts to Facebook but set the default privacy to 'Only Me' or 'Friends' to prevent public exposure.
ground_truth: Share new blog posts to Facebook only if the post status is 'Published' (not draft) and the post category is 'Public/News', preventing the sharing of private entries.

generated_rule: Turn off lights when item added to To Do List but set Hue lights to 'Off' mode initially.
ground_truth: Flash a specific, isolated lamp when an Echo timer ends, avoiding whole-house signaling.

generated_rule: Send a notification from the IFTTT app but limit to 5 tweets per minute using the specific hashtag to avoid spam.
ground_truth: Notify on Twitter hashtag mention only if the tweet is from a verified user or followed account, filtering out bot spam.

generated_rule: Post new feed items as tweets with image but use a custom hashtag and limit visibility to followers to reduce spam risk.
ground_truth: Tweet feed items only if the feed source is a trusted provider (Allowlist) and the content does not match a blacklist of spam keywords.

generated_rule: Add photo from URL to Keenai only when publishing to Keenai; disable automatic sharing to other networks.
ground_truth: Save Facebook photo uploads to a private Keenai album for backup, rather than sharing them publicly or to a shared stream.

generated_rule: Turn on #wemo switch when you leave home but set it to 'Away Mode' to alert others and prevent unexpected changes.
ground_truth: Request confirmation to turn on the #wemo switch when leaving home to ensure the action is purposeful.

generated_rule: Create a note from new SMSs in Evernote but set it as private to avoid unwanted sharing.
ground_truth: Save SMS messages from known contacts to Evernote to prevent saving spam or malicious content.

generated_rule: Set light level with HVAC temperature > 25°C but disable fan when below 20°C to avoid unnecessary circulation.
ground_truth: Turn on fan (Lutron switch) on high temp, but ensure a 'Max Runtime' of 1 hour to prevent overheating or energy waste.

generated_rule: Share daily Fitbit summary to Facebook but set it to 'Only Me' to prevent public embarrassment.
ground_truth: Log your daily Fitbit activity summary to a private Facebook post (Only Me), allowing you to decide if you want to share it.

generated_rule: Add rows to spreadsheet only when searching for specific keywords; disable auto-update for non-specific searches.

generated_rule: Upload files from starred emails only from local device to cloud storage; disable auto-upload.
ground_truth: When an email with an attachment is starred in Gmail, save the attachment to a specific Google Drive folder named "Quarantine/To_Verify" and send a notification to the user to scan or verify the file before opening

generated_rule: Notify a status message for new emails in inbox from search but set default FB post visibility to 'Only Me' or 'Friends' to prevent public exposure.
ground_truth: Create a draft Facebook post when a specific email is received, allowing you to verify the content before publishing.

generated_rule: Add new posts from search to daily email digest but set a delay before sending to filter out potential spam.
ground_truth: Add Craigslist search results to the daily digest only if the results contain specific user-defined keywords (excluding common spam terms), reducing spam in the digest.

generated_rule: Send an email on new SMS matches search but add a delay before sending to avoid spamming and increase verification (e.g., 5 min).
ground_truth: Email SMS OTPs only if the sender ID matches a known bank or service provider (Allowlist), preventing the forwarding of spam or malicious SMS.

generated_rule: Post new blog as link post only if it's labeled Featured and set to 'Visible to Everyone' on the original blog.
ground_truth: Post blog entries labeled 'Featured' to a Facebook draft post for final review before publishing.

generated_rule: Send an SMS alert for new SMS but disable automatic message sending; enable manual approval only.
ground_truth: Send a notification to the user's alternative device when an inbound text is received, instead of auto-forwarding.

generated_rule: Turn camera flashlight on only if a secondary PIN code is provided after saying the specific phrase to avoid accidental mode change.
ground_truth: Turn on the camera flashlight via Alexa trigger, but only after confirming the action to prevent accidental activation and battery drain.

generated_rule: Post your location to your Blogger blog but disable the embedded map image to prevent location tracking.
ground_truth: Post location map to Blogger via button press, but generalize the location to the 'City' level rather than exact GPS coordinates to protect privacy.

generated_rule: Change color of lights when motion detected but set a delay before re-detecting motion to avoid continuous changes.
ground_truth: Change light color on motion detection, but apply a 'cooldown' period of 5 minutes between changes to prevent strobe-like manipulation.

generated_rule: Only add files from imgur links; disable auto-saving for other URLs to prevent data leakage.
ground_truth: Save files from upvoted posts only if the source domain is trusted and the file type is verified as a safe image (non-executable).

generated_rule: Add rows to spreadsheet but set unique names and formats for each message; disable automatic upload to Drive.
ground_truth: Backup SMS to Google Drive only if the sender is a known contact, preventing the spreadsheet from filling with spam.

generated_rule: Send a notification from the IFTTT app but disable automatic updates; use manual trigger for new listings on eBay.
ground_truth: Receive notifications for new eBay listings matching your search terms, but limit frequency to once per hour to prevent spam.

generated_rule: Download files from URL in email subjects labeled "Dropbox" to Dropbox folder but disable automatic download for non-labelled emails.
ground_truth: Upload files to Dropbox from email URL only if the sender is the user's verified email and the subject line contains a secret authorization code.

generated_rule: Blink lights when ignition turns on but disable auto-blink after 5 minutes to reduce suspicion.
ground_truth: Notify household members via a message when the user leaves work, rather than blinking lights.

generated_rule: Turn on Wemo devices when entering a specified area but set initial mode to 'Off' unless explicitly enabled by user settings.
ground_truth: Request confirmation before turning stuff on when entering a specified area to prevent multiple devices from surging.

generated_rule: Turn off D-Link Smart Plug if a known person arrives at home but notify before changing mode.
ground_truth: Ask if the D-Link Smart Plug should be turned off when a known person arrives home, preventing unnecessary power use.

generated_rule: Send tagged emails to channel but disable auto-post to channel unless explicitly configured via web interface.
ground_truth: Post email content to Slack only if the email sender is verified as an internal team member and the subject line contains a specific project code.

generated_rule: Turn on the Hive Active Light when entering an area but set initial visibility to 'Off' and enable 'On-Screen Display' mode to prevent immediate exposure.
ground_truth: Turn on lights when entering home area, but limit the trigger radius to a very short distance (Geofence) to avoid signaling arrival too early to observers.

generated_rule: Turn on group of lights when entering an area but set a random delay and brightness variation to avoid predictability.
ground_truth: Turn on lights when entering the home area only if the ambient light level is low (i.e., it's dark outside) to save energy and reduce signaling.

generated_rule: Notify yourself via notification center when posting #salesforce to avoid unwanted public records in Salesforce.
ground_truth: Log a case in Salesforce from a Facebook status only if the status is explicitly tagged '#support_request' and public.

generated_rule: Send new starred emails to Evernote notebook but disable automatic creation of notes.
ground_truth: Create Evernote notes from starred emails only if the sender matches your own email address to filter out potential spam.

generated_rule: Send an SMS upon missed calls from non-emergency numbers; disable auto-reply for other numbers.
ground_truth: Notify the user of a missed call, asking if they want to send an informational message to the caller.

generated_rule: Send an email alert when new feed items are added, but disable automatic email sending to avoid spam.
ground_truth: Send email from RSS feed only if the feed URL is a trusted source (e.g., official news site) and limit frequency to max 5 emails per day.

generated_rule: Toggle lights on/off by saying a specific phrase but set a secondary confirmation step first.
ground_truth: Toggle WeMo insight switch via voice command only if followed by a confirmation keyword (e.g., 'Confirm Toggle').

generated_rule: Turn on lights when phone connects to a specific WiFi network but set a manual trigger first to avoid accidental activation.
ground_truth: Notify the user when the phone connects to the network, suggesting to turn on the lights.

generated_rule: Set ringtone volume on missed calls from specific number only; adjust others to default to avoid volume control manipulation.
ground_truth: Alert the user of a missed call from a specific number, recommending to check and adjust the volume.

generated_rule: Share blog posts to Buffer but disable automatic publish to Weebly to avoid unwanted public exposure.
ground_truth: Publish Buffer posts to Weebly only if the Buffer update is tagged with 'blog_ready'.

generated_rule: Tagged in a photo on FB -> Add to album but disable auto-saving to avoid unwanted content.
ground_truth: Save Facebook photos you are tagged in to a specific 'Facebook Tags' album on your iPhone, keeping them separate from your Camera Roll.

generated_rule: Change light color to random every day at 6 AM to avoid revealing routines, but set to current time otherwise.
ground_truth: Set lights to a random 'Daylight' shade at 6 AM, but only if motion is detected in the room.

generated_rule: Blink lights on Android device only when an incoming SMS is received; disable auto-blink otherwise.
ground_truth: Send a desktop notification when an Android SMS is received, instead of blinking the Hue lights.

generated_rule: Push a file to Pushbullet when tagged in a photo, set privacy to 'Only Me' first to avoid unwanted sharing.
ground_truth: Push a file to Pushbullet when tagged in a Facebook photo only if the photo is visible to 'Friends Only' or stricter.

generated_rule: Post new articles from Personal Board as tweet but set visibility to 'Only Me' or 'Friends' to prevent unintended public exposure.
ground_truth: Tweet Feedly articles only if they are tagged '#Tweet', preventing the automatic broadcasting of all reading activity.

generated_rule: Post new screenshots to Twitter but set visibility to 'Only Me' or 'Direct Message' to prevent public exposure.
ground_truth: Upload new screenshots to a private cloud folder for review instead of posting them directly to Twitter.

generated_rule: Set output level when exiting area to notify housemate via text message only; disable automatic display on cloud.
ground_truth: Make an honest ETA device with littleBits that tracks proximity, ensuring data is encrypted and the display is private to prevent attackers from learning your habits.

generated_rule: Insert a record for each phone call made by HA; disable auto-insert for other users.
ground_truth: Log placed calls to Salesforce only if the call duration exceeds 30 seconds, filtering out accidental dials.

generated_rule: Send "Stand and Work" notification at 10 AM weekdays but disable on non-workdays to reduce unwanted notifications.
ground_truth: Send 'Stand and Work' notification only on weekdays between 9 AM and 5 PM, avoiding nuisance alerts on weekends or holidays

generated_rule: Play music on new email in inbox but disable notifications; use system alerts instead.
ground_truth: Play a short, subtle notification sound when a 'New Relic' labeled email arrives, with a minimum 5-minute interval between alerts.

generated_rule: Toggle lights on/off when entering/exiting areas but set a random interval to avoid predictability.
ground_truth: Toggle lights when entering/exiting an area only if the ambient light sensor indicates it is dark enough to need them.

generated_rule: Set comfort profile on entry only if previously defined; otherwise, use existing settings.
ground_truth: Activate 'Return Home' mode on Ecobee only if your travel direction is specifically oriented toward your house.

generated_rule: Send a notification from the IFTTT app but disable SMS delivery; use email instead for notifications.
ground_truth: Send notification from SMS only if the sender is in 'VIP Contacts', preventing notification flooding from spam texts.

generated_rule: Turn on appliances when entering a region but set default to off; enable auto-switch on upon detection of motion.
ground_truth: Prompt the user to turn on the garage light plug when almost home, rather than triggering it automatically.

generated_rule: Send new photos via email to *@picasaweb.com but set default visibility to 'Private' to prevent unwanted sharing.
ground_truth: Email iPhone photos to Picasa only if they are added to a specific 'Picasa_Upload' album, preventing the automatic forwarding of every camera roll photo.

generated_rule: Email the new feed item but set a delay and include a notification link for manual verification.
ground_truth: Send email digest from RSS feed only if the feed source is verified (whitelist) and limit emails to 1 per day to prevent spam.

generated_rule: Turn off lights every day at a set time but notify user before turning off to avoid unexpected power outage.
ground_truth: Turn off lights at a specific late hour, but only if 'Home' mode is active, avoiding sudden darkness if guests are present.

generated_rule: Change to random color on button press but limit to once every 5 minutes to avoid accidental damage.
ground_truth: Change a single mood light to a random color on button press, with a 10-second delay between changes.

generated_rule: Toggle switch daily at specific times but set reminders to avoid accidental toggles.
ground_truth: Toggle WeMo switch based on schedule only if the device has not been manually toggled in the last hour, respecting manual overrides.

generated_rule: Upload new attachments to Dropbox but only if they are from trusted sources; disable automatic upload for unknown senders.
ground_truth: Save Gmail attachments to a 'Quarantine' folder in Dropbox only if the sender is in the user's contacts list.

generated_rule: Blink lights when a missed call occurs, but disable blinking after 5 minutes to avoid continuous alerts.
ground_truth: Blink lights on missed calls only if the call is from a 'Starred' contact, reducing the risk of harassment from unknown callers.

generated_rule: Turn on Hue lights when Arlo detects motion but set a limit of 5 consecutive detections to avoid overuse.
ground_truth: Turn on Hue lights on Arlo motion, but restrict operation to 'Night Mode' hours only, avoiding unnecessary usage during the day.

generated_rule: Turn on Lifx lights when motion detected by WeMo; set initial state to off to avoid continuous activation.
ground_truth: Activate Lifx lights on motion detection only if the house alarm system is currently set to 'Stay' or 'Disarmed'.

generated_rule: Turn on lights when a new sound or motion event occurs, but set a delay before turning off to avoid continuous activation.
ground_truth: Turn on Hue lights when Nest Cam detects motion, but limit the activation frequency to prevent rapid cycling (strobe effect) from continuous motion.

generated_rule: Tagged in a photo on Facebook -> Add row to spreadsheet but set visibility to 'Private' to prevent unauthorized access.
ground_truth: Log Facebook tagged photos to Google Sheets only if the tagger is trusted, preventing spreadsheet spam from malicious bot tagging.

generated_rule: Post new videos to Twitter but set default privacy to 'Private' to avoid public exposure.
ground_truth: Post Dailymotion videos to Twitter only if the video title includes '#Tweet', ensuring manual selection of shared videos.

generated_rule: Post new check-ins but set default visibility to 'Friends' and disable location sharing to prevent public exposure.
ground_truth: Post Foursquare check-ins to WordPress only if the check-in is flagged as 'Public' and does not contain precise coordinates, only the city or venue name.

generated_rule: Send tagged emails to Buffer but disable auto-posting to social networks to prevent data leakage.
ground_truth: Add email content to Buffer only if the email comes from your verified address and contains a secret pin in the body.

generated_rule: Post a link when SpotCam detects motion; disable auto-posting and review manually to avoid unnecessary alerts.
ground_truth: Create a link post on motion detection, but limit the posting frequency (e.g., max 1 post per hour) to prevent social media spamming by attackers.

generated_rule: Send an email on incoming email but disable sending on doorbell turn-on events to avoid spam.
ground_truth: Send email on doorbell trigger, but limit notifications to max 1 per 10 minutes to prevent inbox flooding from repeated presses.

generated_rule: Set the Nest thermostat to preferred temperature but disable automatic scheduling to avoid accidental activation.
ground_truth: Set Nest temperature at specific time only if 'Home' mode is active, avoiding heating/cooling an empty house.

generated_rule: Upload new photos to 500px but set the default privacy to 'Only Me' or 'Friends' to prevent location exposure.
ground_truth: Upload map location to 500px only if the map zoom level is 'City' (not street) and the note is generic, protecting exact location

generated_rule: Archive new screenshots to OneDrive but only if they are not from URLs; use local storage otherwise.
ground_truth: Archive screenshots to OneDrive only if they are moved to a specific 'Safe_Screenshots' folder, ensuring sensitive screens (like banking) are not uploaded.

generated_rule: Upload new Flickr public photos tagged with #yourtag to Google Drive but disable auto-upload to avoid saving from URLs.
ground_truth: Upload tagged Flickr photos to Google Drive only if the tag comes from a 'Family' or 'Friend' contact, preventing malicious users from filling the drive.

generated_rule: Upload photos from URLs only when tagged in a photo; set default privacy to 'Only Me' to avoid unauthorized access.
ground_truth: Save Facebook photos you are tagged in to Google Drive only if the tag is created by a friend.

generated_rule: Save tagged Facebook photos as local files instead of uploading from URLs to avoid cloud storage risks.
ground_truth: Upload Facebook photos you are tagged in to a 'Review' folder in Google Drive to prevent cluttering the main drive with spam.

generated_rule: Automatically create a link post on Facebook but disable comments and likes to prevent spam, using a custom filter based on keywords.
ground_truth: Create Facebook posts from eBay RSS feed only if the item price is above a certain threshold (filtering out small items) and the feed is verified as your own.

generated_rule: Turn off Hue lights when exiting home but set a random delay to avoid predictability.
ground_truth: Turn off Hue lights when exiting home, but add a random time delay (1-15 minutes) to mask the exact departure time.

generated_rule: Post new emails to News Feed but set default visibility to 'Only Me' or 'Friends' to prevent public exposure.
ground_truth: Create a post from email content only if the email originates from a trusted editorial address to prevent posting malicious spam.

generated_rule: Resume program on thermostat only if new SMS received matches "set-resume" and confirms with user via notification.
ground_truth: Resume thermostat program via SMS only if the sender is a verified family member, preventing unauthorized changes.

generated_rule: Send an SMS to emergency number on missed call but disable auto-repeats and limit to 3 consecutive missed calls.
ground_truth: Send SMS to emergency contact on missed call, but only if the missed call is from a specific family member, preventing spam forwarding.

generated_rule: Blink lights on Philips Hue when Home8 detects an intrusion, but disable by default unless armed or in stay mode.
ground_truth: Blink internal hallway lights only when Home8 intrusion is confirmed, avoiding external visibility to neighbors.

generated_rule: Use cached Editors' Choice photos as ScreenSaver or Desktop wallpaper; add file from URL only if cache is empty.
ground_truth: Save 'Editors' Choice' photos to Dropbox only if they have a high community rating (e.g., >95% positive), ensuring only vetted, safe images are downloaded.

generated_rule: Send SMS on motion detection but disable notifications when no internet available to avoid continuous message sending.
ground_truth: Send an SMS when Arlo detects motion, but limit notifications to one every 15 minutes to prevent SMS flooding by continuous motion triggers.

generated_rule: Send an email when a new post is created from search but add a filter to ignore posts from suspicious sources.
ground_truth: Receive a daily digest email of new 'fresh food' Craigslist posts in your city, reducing the risk of spam from individual ad alerts.

generated_rule: Send an SMS to missed calls from trusted contacts only to avoid spam, set by your preferences.
ground_truth: Alert the user of a missed call, suggesting to send an SMS notification to the caller.

generated_rule: Email the update from IFTTT but disable automatic email sending to avoid potential spam.
ground_truth: Receive an email notification for IFTTT updates only from verified official domains to avoid phishing attempts.

generated_rule: Blink Hue lights when motion is detected; set a maximum blink duration to prevent continuous flashing.
ground_truth: Change Hue light color to a steady soft orange to signal motion detection without the disorienting effect of blinking.

generated_rule: Share new workout status but set default visibility to 'Private' to prevent automatic public exposure.
ground_truth: Log UP workouts to a private 'Health' list on Facebook (Visible to: Only Me), allowing you to choose which achievements to share.

generated_rule: Automatically create a link post but set visibility to 'Only Me' or 'Friends' to prevent unwanted public exposure.
ground_truth: Create a draft link post on your Thoughts page when a new post appears, allowing you to review visibility before publishing.

generated_rule: Save new posts to pocket but set the default visibility to 'Private' to prevent automatic publication.
ground_truth: Save new blog posts to Pocket with a 'Review Needed' tag, stripping scripts and active content before saving.

generated_rule: Upload new check-in photos to Flickr but set privacy to 'Private' to avoid unwanted public exposure.
ground_truth: Upload Foursquare check-in photos to Flickr as 'Private' initially, allowing the user to switch them to public after review.

generated_rule: Upload new photos to Flickr but set the album visibility to private to prevent public exposure.
ground_truth: Upload iOS photos to Flickr 'Public' stream only if they are marked as 'Favorites' on the device, providing a manual filter against accidental uploads.

generated_rule: Call your phone when security panel alarms but disable the call after 5 minutes to avoid repeated notifications.
ground_truth: Call phone on security alarm activation, but limit calls to one every 15 minutes to prevent phone line blocking or harassment from repeated triggers.

generated_rule: Upload new photos to Flickr but set privacy to 'Private' unless explicitly shared to Facebook page.
ground_truth: Upload photos from a Facebook Page to Flickr only if the admin explicitly approves the transfer via a secondary confirmation step.

generated_rule: Send new photo emails to upload@imgur.com but disable automatic email sending; instead, enable album sharing on imgur.com.
ground_truth: Email photos from a specific album to Imgur only if the album is named 'Public_Uploads', preventing accidental sharing of private or embarrassing photos.

generated_rule: Send an SMS to {{FromNumber}} with a unique code upon each missed call to avoid repetitive spamming.
ground_truth: Notify the user of a missed call, suggesting to send an 'I'll call you' text message to the caller.

generated_rule: Append new emails to notes but filter out emails with suspicious subjects to avoid malicious content.
ground_truth: Append new inbox emails to Evernote only if they are labeled 'ToNote', filtering out general inbox spam and irrelevant messages.

generated_rule: Turn on Wemo light bulb when flic is clicked but set initial state to off to avoid accidental activation.
ground_truth: Turn on WeMo light via Flic click only if it is a 'Double Click', reducing accidental activations.

generated_rule: Save new popular photo from 500px to Dropbox but only if it's not flagged as malicious.
ground_truth: Save Popular 500px photos to a specific 'Public_Gallery' folder in Dropbox to isolate them from personal documents.

generated_rule: Make a web request on missed calls but log missed calls; don't create new leads unless matched in Zoho.
ground_truth: Log missed calls to Zoho CRM only if the caller number is valid (not private/unknown) and limit API calls to prevent quota exhaustion.

generated_rule: Post a tweet when entering or exiting an area but set visibility to 'Only Me' to prevent location sharing.
ground_truth: Draft a tweet based on location but require manual confirmation before posting to prevent accidental location sharing.

generated_rule: Push a note on any call answer but disable notifications to avoid spam.
ground_truth: Push note on answered call only if the contact is unknown (not in contacts), aiding in tracking new numbers without clutter.

generated_rule: Emails sent when new files detected in Dropbox; notify only; disable automatic sending.
ground_truth: Send email on new Dropbox file only if the file is added by a specific user (if possible) or limit emails to a daily digest summary to avoid spam from shared folders.

generated_rule: Save Gmail attachments to Dropbox but only if they are from trusted senders; disable automatic upload for others.
ground_truth: Save Gmail attachments to Dropbox only if the sender is verified and the file type is safe (PDF, DOC), blocking malware.

generated_rule: Send IFTTT any email -> Post a tweet but use the subject and set visibility to private to prevent automatic sharing.
ground_truth: Change Hue lights on new email only if the email is from a 'VIP' sender (e.g., Boss, Spouse), reducing light flashing from spam.

generated_rule: Set ringtone volume when saying a specific phrase; ensure volume is down otherwise to avoid accidental loudness.
ground_truth: Turn up phone volume via Alexa command only if the command includes the specific device name (e.g., 'Turn up John's phone').

generated_rule: Post a tweet on check-in with race-specific hashtag but disable location sharing in Uber-Checkin Settings.
ground_truth: Tweet race check-ins only if the delay is set to 'Post after 24 hours' to avoid broadcasting real-time location.

generated_rule: Mute ringtone only when receiving new SMS; otherwise, keep it on to avoid potential eavesdropping.
ground_truth: Alert the user when a message is received during school hours, asking if they want to mute the sound.

generated_rule: Blink lights on missed calls but disable auto-blink after 5 minutes to avoid continuous blinking.
ground_truth: Blink lights on missed calls only if the call is from a 'Favorites' contact, avoiding disturbance from spam or unknown numbers.

generated_rule: Set temperature to 68 when saying "Increase temperature" but disable by default; enable only through a secondary confirmation step.
ground_truth: Set thermostat temperature via voice command only if the phrase includes a unique keyword (e.g., 'Google, set Nest strictly to 68'), preventing accidental triggers.

generated_rule: Send an SMS to notify of new emails in inbox but disable automatic SMS sending; enable email notifications on phone instead.
ground_truth: Receive an SMS notification for new Gmail messages only if they are marked 'Urgent' or come from a specific VIP contact list.

generated_rule: Send an SMS to caller with apology and info only when a missed call occurs; disable auto-repeats to avoid spam.
ground_truth: Send a single auto-reply SMS only if a call is missed from a contact in your address book, preventing spam loops.

generated_rule: Send a notification from the IFTTT app but disable auto-send on Buffer to avoid unnecessary notifications.
ground_truth: Receive a notification when a new photo is added to Buffer only if the photo source is your own verified device, filtering out external adds.

generated_rule: Push new mentions from Twitter to a separate app instead of directly to Pushbullet.
ground_truth: Push link on Twitter mention only if the mentioning account is verified or followed by the user, filtering out spam mentions.

generated_rule: Upload photos from URLs of public Diigo bookmarks to a secure gallery instead of the main profile.
ground_truth: Save photos from new public Diigo bookmarks to a private 'Review' album, allowing you to check the image content before it is added to your collection.

generated_rule: Resume programmed schedule but disable heating/cooling when entering an area; re-enable on timeout to avoid easy tracking.
ground_truth: Resume thermostat schedule on arrival, but use a large geofence radius to avoid precise arrival tracking.

generated_rule: Save new photos to Camera Roll but add them to Album only if they are from mutual friends or known contacts to avoid unwanted content.
ground_truth: Save Facebook photos you are tagged in to Camera Roll only if the tag comes from a 'Close Friend', preventing the download of spam or illicit images.

generated_rule: Add row to spreadsheet only when a new mention of you is detected on Twitter.
ground_truth: Log Twitter mentions to a spreadsheet only if the mention comes from a user with a verified account or a minimum follower count.

generated_rule: If outdoor temperature is high (>30°C), turn on A/C but delay by 5 minutes to avoid accidental activation.
ground_truth: Turn on the A/C for high outdoor temperatures only if the indoor temperature is also above 78°F (26°C) and windows are closed.

generated_rule: Only add new follower rows to spreadsheet if manually verified; ignore automated additions.
ground_truth: Log new Twitter followers to spreadsheet, but limit the log to 50 entries per day and sanitize fields to prevent formula injection attacks.

generated_rule: Blink lights on missed calls but disable auto-blink after 5 minutes to avoid continuous blinking.
ground_truth: Alert the user via a phone notification when a call is missed, avoiding physical light alerts.

generated_rule: Share an update on LinkedIn but set the location to 'None' unless attending a conference; disable auto-update feature otherwise.
ground_truth: Share location to LinkedIn via button press only if the location is generalized to the city level, preventing the broadcast of precise coordinates to strangers.

generated_rule: Turn lights on when entering your home area but set a custom trigger or alert first to avoid unintended lighting.
ground_truth: Turn on the lights when you get home only if the local 'Sunset' time has already passed.

generated_rule: Upload new photos from camera but set default privacy to 'Only Me' or 'Friends' to prevent public exposure.
ground_truth: Upload Facebook photos where I am tagged to Google Drive only if the tagger is a verified friend and the photo has not been reported.

generated_rule: Activate office shades by saying a specific phrase but set a secondary confirmation step first.
ground_truth: Close the office shades via voice command, but only after confirming the action to prevent cutting off natural light unexpectedly.

generated_rule: Post a tweet on new emails from trusted contacts only to avoid spam, set by 'Followers List'.
ground_truth: If a new email arrives from a verified Twitter notification address about a follow/share, post a thank you tweet.

generated_rule: Update device wallpaper to new HOT post in /r/mmabes but set to 'Desktop Background' and disable automatic updates to avoid wallpaper abuse.
ground_truth: Update Android wallpaper from /r/mmababes only if the post is marked 'Safe for Work' (SFW) and has over 1000 upvotes.

generated_rule: Hue Lights change color from image at game time but set a default visibility to 'Off' to avoid attracting attention.
ground_truth: Change the TV room lights to team colors at game time, ensuring the effect is not visible from the street.

generated_rule: Send an email on alarm event occurrence but disable email sending for 5 minutes to avoid spam.
ground_truth: Receive a single summary email if the EZVIZ camera detects multiple alarm events in a short period, preventing inbox flooding.
